widget.title: TextArea
widget.p: TextArea is a multi-line area that displays plain text and internally handles scrolling.

parameters.parameter: The text contained in this textarea.
The number of visible letters in a column.
The number of visible rows for this textarea.
The specified boolean to indicate whether or not this textarea should be editable. A non-editable area is focusable, and selectable.
If set to true the lines will be wrapped at word boundaries (whitespace) if they are too long to fit within the allocated width.

If set to false, no border will be drawn around the textarea, and its background will be set to the default background color, to visually "blend" with its container. You can still override this by setting a custom background color.
End index of the selection, same as the caret position.
Gives notification (invokes the given method) that there was an insert into the text or a portion of the text has been removed.
name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component

keys.key: Moves to end of row or line
Moves insertion point up one line
Moves insertion point down one line
Moves insertion point one character to the right
Moves insertion point one character to the left
Moves insertion point to beginning of next word
Moves insertion point to beginning of previous word
Cuts selected text into the clipboard
Copies selected text into the clipboard
